front.div:
Abstract
We present a novel perspective on the problem of time in quantum gravity. Inspired
by Einstein's analysis of the concept of time and the equivalence principle and guided
by the geometric structure of quantum theory, we offer new insights into the nature
and the origin of time ¶ .
front.note: ¶ Essay submitted to the FQXi Inaugural Essay Contest on the Nature of Time.
